name: pnp-powerplatform-snippets-responsive-her-card-gallery
title: Responsive Hero Card Gallery
shortDescription: This is a Power Apps YAML snippet that shows a responsive gallery of clickable hero cards similar to those you see in make.powerapps.com.
longDescription: This is a Power Apps YAML snippet that shows a responsive gallery of clickable hero cards similar to those you see in make.powerapps.com. Cards will re-flow as the width of the app reduces. The heigh of the container is dynamically calculated to accommodate the wrapped cards.
